name: Joshua Corbett

education.details: Conditional Offer: MEng Materials Science and Engineering, Imperial College London.

education.institution: Centre for Talented Youth (Dublin City University)
education.details: Selected for enrichment programme (95th percentile academic ability).

experience.details: Selected from top 9% of national applicants for a seven-week programme where I built Puzz.

experience.company: Department of Enterprise, Trade and Employment
experience.details: Observed civil service operations in economic development and employment policy.
Exposure to financial operations and budgeting in a large-scale enterprise.

achievements: Top 20 National Finalist, Irish European Olympiad of Experimental Science (Physics).
Student of the Year, St. Mary’s CBS (two consecutive years).
Football Captain, Student Council Chairman, and Debate Captain.
Short film 'Mirror' premiered at Generation Fleadh (2024) and Fresh Film (2025).
